description: A collection of character style groups.

properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.
properties.name: length

parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new CharacterStyleGroup (Optional)
parameters.name: withProperties

methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the CharacterStyleGroup.
methods.name: count

methods.description: Returns the CharacterStyleGroup with the specified index or name.

parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: index

methods.name: item

methods.description: Returns the CharacterStyleGroup with the specified name.
methods.name: itemByName

methods.description: Returns the CharacterStyleGroup with the specified ID.
methods.name: itemByID

methods.description: Returns the CharacterStyleGroups within the specified range.

parameters.description: The CharacterStyleGroup, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: CharacterStyleGroup, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: The CharacterStyleGroup, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: CharacterStyleGroup, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: to

methods.name: itemByRange

methods.description: Returns the first CharacterStyleGroup in the collection.
methods.name: firstItem

methods.description: Returns the last CharacterStyleGroup in the collection.
methods.name: lastItem

methods.description: Returns the middle CharacterStyleGroup in the collection.
methods.name: middleItem

methods.description: Returns the CharacterStyleGroup with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.description: The index of the CharacterStyleGroup that follows the desired CharacterStyleGroup.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: previousItem

methods.description: Returns the CharacterStyleGroup whose index follows the specified CharacterStyleGroup in the collection.

parameters.description: The CharacterStyleGroup whose index comes before the desired CharacterStyleGroup.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: nextItem

methods.description: Returns any CharacterStyleGroup in the collection.
methods.name: anyItem

methods.description: Returns every CharacterStyleGroup in the collection.
methods.name: everyItem

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the CharacterStyleGroup.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Returns the CharacterStyleGroup with the specified index.

name: CharacterStyleGroups
